promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young epic ibex electric-type pokemon wearing yellow and teal bracers. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltexis, a a chibi young epic ibex electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: Teraspark, Self Destruct. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "electric" or "Voltexis". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, ibex-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange galaxy background
generatedDescription: This cheeky urban dweller, with its horns crackling with energy, uses Teraspark to power city lights or causes outages with Self Destruct.
